caption: A group of cars with eyes and mouths are in a room, talking. A blue car stands on a stage in the room. The red car has locks on its wheels but is released by a trailer. The red car speeds away in the desert along the road. Soon, it's blocked by two other cars. The red car returns to a massive machine. Asphalt is rolling off its body. Before it is a dilapidated road. Several cars are driving on this beaten road. In the stadium, a blue helicopter appears.
